quotes.quote: Not all who wander are lost
I only regret that I have but one life to lose for my country
I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately
The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do
The work of an individual still remains the spark that moves mankind forward
Do or do not, there is no try
The ability to speak does not make you intelligent
fu bu guo san dai (wealth doesn't make it past three generations)
Imagination is more important than knowledge
The United States government is basically a large insurance company backed by the largest free standing army in the world
Nobody climbs a mountain to get to the middle
If a corporation was a person it would be a sociopath
The mass of men lead lives in quiet desperation
He who has many friends has no friends
Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster
History will be kind to me, for I intend to write it
I’ve made every mistake in the book, but I’ve only made them once
The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that he wants to live humbly for one
We are like the spider
quotes.attributed_to: We weave our life and then move along in it

quotes.quote: It takes more than intelligence to act intelligently
Don't worry about what anybody else is going to do
quotes.attributed_to: The best way to predict the future is to invent it

quotes.quote: The imagination of nature is far, far greater than the imagination of man

The 4 immutable laws of the spirit: 1) whoever is present are the right people 2) whatever happens is the only thing that could have happened 3) whenever is begins is the right time 4) when it's over, it's over
